span.p:
kube-scheduler
DynamicResources Plugin
Filters nodes via CEL

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
kube-apiserver
API Objects:
ResourceClaim, DeviceClass, ResourceSlice

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
DRA Driver Controller
Publishes ResourceSlices
Updates status

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
kubelet (DRA Manager)
Allocates resources via CRI
Injects CDI specs

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
DRA Driver Plugin (Vendor)
Implements gRPC Interface
NodePrepareResources()

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Container Runtime
(containerd / CRI-O / Docker)
Mounts device nodes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Hardware Drivers
nvidia.ko, amd.ko, tpu drivers

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
